mapper.sql: bh.id as bh_id, bh.cost_type_id as bh_cost_type_id, bh.cost_type_name as bh_cost_type_name, bh.department_id as bh_department_id, bh.department_name as bh_department_name, bh.budget_month as bh_budget_month, bh.budget_money as bh_budget_money, bh.budget_Type as bh_budget_Type, bh.record_status as bh_record_status, bh.created_time as bh_created_time, bh.modifier_account as bh_modifier_account, bh.modified_time as bh_modified_time, bh.creator_account as bh_creator_account
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_finance_budget_history bh
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
